pullRequest.title: Update JWT guide with the builder API intro and fix some typos
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR provides the introduction to the JWT Builder API and also fixes few typos and adds two missing properties (as spotted by a smallrye-jwt committer @MikeEdgar during the smallrye-jwt PR review)
